purpose: The email is a call for participation in the 13th International Conference on Software Engineering Research and Innovation (CONISOFT 2025), which will be held from October 27 to October 31, 2025, in La Paz, BCS, Mexico. The conference aims to bring together practitioners and researchers from various sectors to advance software engineering and promote collaboration between academia and industry. It encourages submissions that integrate theoretical and practical aspects of software engineering. The submission deadline is June 15, 2025, and registration is available online.

infos:
Subject: Call for Participation 13th International Conference on Software Engineering Research and Innovation CONISOFT
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Date:Fri, 23 May 2025 14:22:03 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain
13th International Conference on Software Engineering Research and Innovation
October 27 to October 31, 2025, La Paz, BCS., Mexico.
Organized by the Software Engineering Mexican Network (REDMIS) in cooperation with Universidad Autónoma de Baja California Sur.

The 13th International Conference on Software Engineering Research and Innovation (CONISOFT 2025) is set to take place at Universidad Autónoma de Baja California Sur La Paz, BCS., Mexico, from October 27 to October 31, 2025.
